channel.title: Trouble editing a '.xml.gz' successfully. Please help?
channel.description:
Hey there guys. I'm a noob editor, as I'm obviously not a coder and will never claim to be! At least for now.
I'm trying to edit the name of the "Iron Square Shield" that's sold in the Falador shield shop.
I figured this was done by editing the name in 'ItemDefs.xml.gz'. - - - So I opened up the file with 7zip, changed the name, and saved it. I then used a compression tool to turn it back into a '.xml.gz.' file. And replaced the old 'ItemDefs.xml.gz' with this new edited one.
Did I do something wrong? Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks guys.
-Lux

item.title: Trouble editing a '.xml.gz' successfully. Please help?
item.dc:creator: @Lux Lux
item.description:
@Lux wrote:

Ahhh… thanks a lot Kryptix. Appreciate it much man. Great server by the way.

-Lux

Read full topic
